MICRO	
	c BOOTSTRAP
m00 0000000000011100001100001101001111010111 //Sw+0->PC,MAR
m01 0000000000000000000100000000001110001111 //PC+1->PC,MAR
	c LDA #K
m02 0000000000010100001111011101011111011110 //PC+1->PC,MAR
m03 0000000000011100001100000111001110011101 //MDR+0->ACC
m04 0000000000010100001111011101011111011110 //PC+1->PC,MAR
m05 0000000000000000000100000000001110001111 //NEXT(PC)
	c LDX #K
m06 0000000000010100001111011101011111011110 //PC+1->PC,MAR
m07 0000000000011100001100000110001110011101 //MDR+0->Î§
m08 0000000000010100001111011101011111011110 //PC+1->PC,MAR
m09 0000000000000000000100000000001110001111 //NEXT(PC)
	c LDA ($K)
m0a 0000000000010100001111011101011111011110 //PC+1->PC,MAR
m0b 0000000000011100000100000000001111011101 //MDR+0->NOP,MAR
m0c 0000000000011100000100000000001111011101 //MDR+0->NOP,MAR
m0d 0000000000011100001100000111001110011101 //MDR+0->ACC
m0e 0000000000010100001111011101011111011110 //PC+1->PC,MAR
m0f 0000000000000000000100000000001110001111 //NEXT(PC)
	c LDAX
m10 0000000000010000000101100000001111011111 //X+0->NOP,MAR
m11 0000000000011100001100000111001110011101 //MDR+0->ACC
m12 0000000000010100001111011101011111011110 //PC+1->PC,MAR
m13 0000000000000000000100000000001110001111 //NEXT(PC)
	c LDA $K,X
m14 0000000000010100001111011101011111011110 //PC+1->PC,MAR
m15 0000000000010100000101100000001111011101 //MDR+X->NOP,MAR
m16 0000000000011100001100000111001110011101 //MDR+0->ACC
m17 0000000000010100001111011101011111011110 //PC+1->PC,MAR
m18 0000000000000000000100000000001110001111 //NEXT(PC)
	c LDA ($K,X)
m19 0000000000010100001111011101011111011110 //PC+1->PC,MAR
m1a 0000000000011100000100000000001111011101 //MDR+0->NOP,MAR
m1b 0000000000010100000101100000001111011101 //MDR+X->NOP,MAR
m1c 0000000000011100001100000111001110011101 //MDR+0->ACC
m1d 0000000000010100001111011101011111011110 //PC+1->PC,MAR
m1e 0000000000000000000100000000001110001111 //NEXT(PC)
	c STA $K
m1f 0000000000010100001111011101011111011110 //PC+1->PC,MAR
m20 0000000000011100000100000000001111011101 //MDR+0->NOP,MAR
m21 0000000000010000000101110000001100011111 //ACC+0->NOP,MWE
m22 0000000000010100001111011101011111011110 //PC+1->PC,MAR
m23 0000000000000000000100000000001110001111 //NEXT(PC)

MAPPER
m00 02 LDA #K
m01 06 LDX #K
m02 0a LDA ($K)
m03 10 LDAX
m04 14 LDA $K,X
m05 19 LDA ($K,X)
m06 1f STA $K
MAIN
m00 00
m01 FF
m02 06
m03 20
m04 01
m05 0c
m06 02
m07 03
m08 06
m09 01
m0a 03
m0b 06
m0c 21
m0d 04
m0e 08
m0f 06
m10 22
m11 05
m12 02
m13 06
m14 23
